protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the production of spermidine from putrescine and decarboxylated S-adenosylmethionine (dcSAM). Has a strong preference for putrescine as substrate, and has very low activity towards 1,3-diaminopropane. Has extremely low activity towards spermidine.

reference.reference_text: Wahlfors J, Alhonen L, Kauppinen L, Hyvonen T, Janne J, Eloranta TO: Human spermidine synthase: cloning and primary structure. DNA Cell Biol. 1990 Mar;9(2):103-10.
